item.title: Starting a trial of Little Bird
item.description: Little Bird is a system that helps you discover influencers and experts in any topic. I’m at the very start of a 7 day trial. Marshall Kirkpatrick is CEO of Little Bird, and he has been active on Twitter posting interesting ideas about influence marketing - and given that it seemed prudent to give the product a try. Pricing is aimed at agencies, not individuals, so I’m going to look at this product through the eyes of people doing “social listening” for a living, tracking the messages that appear on a topic and either quietly making sense of what is happening or actively engaging with those people to try to influence their opinions.
